Our Services

We're passionate about creating delicious and refreshing experiences, no matter the size or setting. Whether you're craving a quick pick-me-up or planning a memorable event, we've got you covered!

Zesty Zobo, Delightful Parfaits, & Savory Small Chops: Our menu offers a variety of treats to satisfy any craving.

Small & Big Events: From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we can cater to events of all sizes.

Indoor or Outdoor: We'll bring the flavor wherever the party is, be it a cozy living room or a spacious outdoor venue.

Customizable Options: Let us know your vision and we'll create a menu that perfectly complements your event.

Ready to add some refreshment and delight to your next gathering? Contact us today for a free consultation!

Our Boss

Hey there! I'm Ogechukwu Onyechukwu, owner of Oge’s sip and chew. We're passionate about delicious Nigerian treats made with fresh ingredients. Craving Zobo, Parfaits, or Small Chops? We have it all!

We also cater events, big or small, indoors or out. Let us make your next gathering unforgettable.

Browse our menu, explore catering, and contact us with any questions.

Happy eating and drinking!
